review: We really like our certified refurbished Amazon Fire TV. It works great and so far no dropped programs and a really outstanding picture. We really enjoy the voice option. The only reason we gave it 4 stars is because we had to buy  a Wi-Fi enhancer (tp-link), since our router is further away than the recommended 30' feet.
